core.util.tilecalc package¶

Module contents¶

Copyright Oliver White 2007 - released “public domain”

http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/index.php/Slippy_map_tilenames

Module implements the PostgreSQL syntax as methods which accept parameters and return parameterized SQL and the input values processed for use as substitution parameters by the cursor.
